text: our experience at the land transport
authority of Singapore with AWS can be
sumed in three words it has been faster
cheaper and better I'm Rosina how the
CIO and group director for Innovation
and infocom Technology at the land
transport Authority in Singapore we are
a government agency responsible for all
land transport development policies and
enforcement land transport in Singapore
is very key to Economic Development we
move at least 2.2 million commuters
every day on public transport so there
is a lot of activity a lot of touch
points and these touch points generate a
lot of public feedback and we need to
respond very quickly we started to look
at the cloud as an alternative we were
conservative so we tried two cloud
service providers it became very obvious
to us that AWS was a stronger service
provider it was very much more cost
effective uh rollup time was much faster
and I think the most wonderful part is
that I didn't have to worry about
Disaster Recovery anymore as a
government agency I have to comply with
what we call ICT security compliance
policies and um AWS was able to meet all
those security requirements so it became
a Natural Choice we use AWS for hosting
Services instead of building our own
data center or building our own
infrastructure for public facing uh
services and comparing to the cost of
setup it is um very
encouraging uh it is a 60% savings over
and internally setup data center besides
cost-saving I think the um deployment
and the roll out is much much faster
government agencies we do have our very
stringent policies the tendering process
takes
sometime it would not be easy for us to
ramp up to scale up at the speed that we
were expected to if we will do do this
on our own for the launch of a new
application we did a simulation of
100,000 users who are guaranteed a
3second response time and at the back of
the system the auto increment takes
place in 7 minutes and this is all
transparent to the end user the sooner
you start the better it is and again you
know it is a Learning Journey you will
find your right balance along the way
[Music]
